entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
